welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Dimitrovgrad, a charming city known for its rich history and picturesque landscapes. We invite you to explore and immerse yourself in our unique culture and experience all that our city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.description: The main terminal at Haskovo Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal primarily used for charter flights and private planes.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
